## NativeRequest type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type NativeRequest = {
    clientId: string;
    authority: string;
    correlationId: string;
    redirectUri: string;
    scopes: Array<string>;

    authenticationScheme?: string;
    resourceRequestMethod?: string;
    resourceRequestUri?: string;
    shrNonce?: string;
    accountId?: string;
```
